content.text:
# List of longest-serving German minister-presidents__disambig_1

This is a list of the 30 longest governing minister-presidents of Germany since 1945 by time in office.

! Rank
! Ministerpräsident
! Period in office
! Duration (Years/Days)
! States of Germany
